definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control

sentences.english: Dream nosegay , mean to have to get, the ability on good terms luck.
sentences.chinese: 梦见花束，意味着有所获，能交好运。

sentences.english: Suddenly, I caught sight of the Valentine flowers which was a bouquet of roses and carnations given by my husband.
sentences.chinese: 我从眼角瞥见了那由玫瑰和康乃馨组成的情人节花束。

sentences.english: There sat her elderly friend, parked in a wheel chair, puttering with a row of posies.
sentences.chinese: 她的老朋友坐在轮椅上，正摆弄着一排花束。

sentences.english: The nosegay for lover to dreams appointment fallen off, relating to depravation.
sentences.chinese: 恋人梦见约会时花束掉落，关系恶化。

sentences.english: This is the bouquet left towards the end of the day.
sentences.chinese: 就好像是一个白天过后留下的花束。

sentences.english: Can also tie the bundles of lavender, the card is inserted in the above table.
sentences.chinese: 也可以扎上几束薰衣草，将桌卡插在花束上面。

sentences.english: John sent me a lovely bouquet of flowers when I was in hospital.
sentences.chinese: 我生病时，东尼送给我一把可爱的花束。

sentences.english: The bridal bouquet has traditionally been a symbol of fertility.
sentences.chinese: 在传统上，新娘花束时儿女满堂的象征。

sentences.english: Later the bride throws IT bouquet of flowers to a assemble of single girls.
sentences.chinese: 之后，新娘将她的花束投向一群单身女刚出生的孩子。

sentences.english: Her crown, bouquet and necklace were made from caramelized(8) sugar.
sentences.chinese: 新娘的头冠，花束和项链都是用焦糖做的。

sentences.english: When giving bouquets, Romanians use flowers of odd number.
sentences.chinese: 罗马尼亚人送花束时，棵数应是单数。

sentences.english: Gather the north flowers to complete the south.
sentences.chinese: 采得北方的花，好完成南方的花束。

sentences.english: The bride's bouquet may be replaced by an old family missal.
sentences.chinese: 而新娘的花束则用传统家庭的弥撒书取代。

sentences.english: They also love the natural and contemporary floral bouquets that are stylish and trendy.
sentences.chinese: 他们还喜欢自然的，富有现代感的，时尚新潮的花束。

sentences.english: The time soon came for the bride to toss her bouquet to the “single ladies.”
sentences.chinese: 很快就到了新娘将花束抛给“单身女”的时候了。

sentences.english: Cartoon bouquets of flowers cake distribution of Qingdao city.
sentences.chinese: 鲜花卡通花束蛋糕配送青岛市各市区。
